resources.string: To begin your search, please, select a grade

WCI Course Listing is a free tool to help you to look up all courses offered at WCI for the 2018-2019 school year. It contains a course name, code, subject, type and a brief description. The data has been retrieved from Waterloo Collegiate Institute School’s 2018-2019 course listing pdf file and Waterloo Region District School Board’s 2017-2018 Common Course Calendar.\nPlease, note: this is an unofficial application and has been created by the school. The sole goal of the creator was to help the students and their parents.
